ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: knowledge of limits, derivatives, and differential equations
Learnt the foundations and fundamentals of calculus
I learned the fundamentals of Calculus and its applications
I got a good introduction in calculus after never having taken a calc course in the past.
I learned the fundamentals of single variable calculus, including how to take a derivative and apply it.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments:
strengths: basic calculus knowledge
weaknesses: hard
Taught very well, I now understand the the foundations of calculus and have interest in continue pursuing math in the future
I think the math is taught in an odd way. It seems that they teach more of how equations are derived than how to use them.

This was tough because most of the students were not math students and just taking it to fulfill requirements, so engagement wasn't high. I'm not really sure how this can be improved, maybe more interactive learning?
TA's should have Office Hours during reading period in preparation for the exam. They should also host reviews before midterms.
Strengths: Mihai is a great and enthusiastic instructor, the class had a pretty good structure. Weaknesses: the psets were sometimes harder than what was taught in class

The strength of the course was the instructor Mihai, who was very patient with explaining concepts during class. A weakness is that the midterms and final seemed to me much less straightforward than practice problems done in class.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: only with mihai! he's really nice and went through the midterms with me and went over all the questions i had.
If youre interested in taking a math class at Yale most definitely
I would recommend to anyone who wants to take any higher level of math at yale. This course is a good intro to how math is taught at yale.
Yes, anyone who needs an easy-ish math requirement should take this.
Yes, the instructor Professor Mihai Alboiu, not the class though.
